name: closefriend
text: I once went through a similar ordeal involving a Pinto.

name: wino
text: she didn't want to do it in a pinto?  thats fucking rude.

name: dusty
text: For some girls the danger factor is a turn on. For others the prospect of being in a car that spontaneously bursts into flame is a turn off.

name: deimosrising
text: Under a Pinto.

name: greyfield
text: Right. Initially, I thought, "okay, well, I suppose if that's all you got her, then I suppose it's insensitive, but still", but under ... I hesitate to consider the logistics involved.

name: dezufnocosem
text: A comment left by dezufnocosem was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by FuckYou, tetrisattack, dj)

name: never_die
text: Man, Ray is a bad boyfriend

name: deancain29
text: Ray = class

name: whuppins
text: Old School = Ray having money problems.

name: hollis
text: When does Ray ever not have a lot of scratch lying around?  Is anyone else confused?

name: kilroywashere
text: I always justified this by saying that Ray got his mad cash from "Ass In Your Pants", but since this is from that weird part of the timeline where Achewood changes from stuffed-animals-in-a-house to cats-and-bears-in-the-Underground, I never lost sleep over it.

name: deusoma
text: I still think of Cornelius at least as a stuffed animal, if for no other reason than his name is "Mr. Bear".

name: rotating-dog
text: Remember that Beatles cover where the crappy wax ones stand around lookin' at the good ones?

name: tekende
text: No?

name: sabbac
text: Sgt Peppers?

name: philosophe
text: Ray made his money from mad piano skills and a porn daguerrotype sold on eBay.

name: honesttom
text: Ray didn't have a lot of scratch lying around because otherwise there would be no punchline.

name: rogergs
text: Early Achewood with demonstrably cat-like sexual behavior.

name: kledermans
text: Is that Pat's Mustang?  I don't blame her for not wanting to do it underneath.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: No, that wouldn't make sense. Onstad weaves in and out of anthro-etc-ism. It's hilarious. Cats often fuck under cars.

name: wae
text: A comment left by wae was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by mikekitchell, orvel, farqussus, terrainasaur)

name: nucleargeranium
text: Hmm. Pat isn't an established asshole yet.

name: tsume454
text: Man that is a mustang II. That is a pinto with mustang emblems. Other mustangs do not invite it to the family reunion.

name: meetzorp
text: And this is probably why Tina was underwhelmed by Ray's offers.

name: boredom_man
text: Mustang II all crawling back to the Pinto family, the Pintos all saying "well hello there Becky Sharp"

name: expellens
text:
Giving this strip a 4 because I used to own a Mustang II. Actually won it in a raffle. Paid a buck.

I got ripped off.

name: fineoakstructure
text: I have a strong feeling that Tina is the kind of gal that would hold her white zin by the bowl.

name: red-barchetta
text: God, those were nasty cars. No wonder she wasn't impressed.

name: seph
text:
Pat's future sexual predalictions are pretty evident if you just read the dialog that isn't there.

"Why would you want that much zin, man? . . . When you could have some ice-cold Zima instead."

name: mattfish
text: Dude Zima is almost less gay than white zinfandel

name: noob
text: Correction.  Nothing is less gay than Zima.

name: notcool
text:
There is nothing more gay than Zima.

If you have your penis in another man's asshole, while screaming "I'm Errol Flynn! I'm Gay Errol Flynn!", that would not be as gay as Zima.

name: waferman
text: Roast Beef all just staring into the distance for fear of decimating the souls of those around him by uttering a single word or MOVING A SINGLE INCH.

name: woodenteeth
text: ... and those soulless pin prick eyes...

name: scorpio_nadir
text: He was pretty catatonic back then.
